entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
